scripts.branch:next: bash -c 'name="$1"; current=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ -n "$name" ]]; then new="$name"; elif [[ $current =~ (.+_)([0-9]+)$ ]]; then new="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}$((${BASH_REMATCH[2]} + 1))"; elif [[ $current =~ (.+_)([0-9]+)\.([0-9]+)(_.+)$ ]]; then new="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}$((${BASH_REMATCH[2]} + 1)).${BASH_REMATCH[3]}${BASH_REMATCH[4]}"; else new="${current}_1"; fi; echo "Creating branch: $new from $current"; git checkout -b "$new"' --
